akn:content.akn:p: [§ 2329. Renumbered § 4506] Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 2329, added Pub. L. 100–180, div. A, title VIII, § 810(a)(1), Dec. 4, 1987, 101 Stat. 1130; amended Pub. L. 100–456, div. A, title XII, § 1233(j), Sept. 29, 1988, 102 Stat. 2058; Pub. L. 103–160, div. A, title IX, § 904(d)(1), Nov. 30, 1993, 107 Stat. 1728, related to contract terms and conditions for production special tooling and production special test equipment, prior to repeal by Pub. L. 103–355, title I, § 1506(a), Oct. 13, 1994, 108 Stat. 3298.
